Review Name: Classy product Review Description: Have been using it for 3 months for now. Cons 1. The color options aren't available for this product. 2. Sometimes, while starting it takes more than a minute to start. Pros 1. Cooling is great, it's ergonomic. 2. Features are quite more in number. 3. It sets the temperature quite high and great. 4. It is overall a cost saving product from Blue Star.
